name: Super Street Rally Racer 2 in 1
summary: Combine the cart in the box of Super Street Racer and the eShop code in the box of Rally Racers and get a great value pack with two great racing games. Super Street Racers (cartridge). The official arcade racing game for Super Street, the world's number One in automotive tuning culture. Start from the bottom with nothing but Scrap as you build your dream ride part by part and use it to tear up asphalt in a wealth of different game modes and environments. Experience intense action-packed classic arcade racing pushing your car to the limit. Customize your ultimate Street racer using tons of Authentic car parts and unleash it on the streets, leaving behind a trail of spectacular and detailed destruction. Rally Racers (code in the box). Wacky cartoon racing at its best, this is an action-packed family racing game that’s fast and furious fun for all. It’s high-speed at its very best. A race of good versus evil, beating the bad guys before they beat you! Bash and battle to racing glory, pick up special weapons and boosts, recruit race mates from the opposition team and complete stunts and challenges to be first over the finish line. Find and collect secret hidden fruit, upgrade cars, perform point-scoring stunts, shoot the bad guys, choose in-game partners based on their specific skill sets, turn the bad guys good and complete action-packed challenges to emerge victorious!
